($50 Minimum) Ends 4/23 The Great World of One Sixth! Never compromise - - Always Open, Always Serving The 1/6 Scale Custom Community! 20% Off All Loose Gear Sale! ($50 Minimum) Ends 4/23 Shop Now World of One Sixth Original! Ozzy Osbourne Head Sculpt Now Available. Limited and In Hand Now! Get Some Check Out Our New Loose Gear! Now Available: Present Toys Chicken Man! We Need You... To Join Our Mailing List & Get Involved In The 1/6th Community. Join Here International Customers Please Read! We understand the costs to ship merchandise from the USA to your location can be rather high.  In our efforts to keep your costs low, we offer to refund you the difference if you overpay for deliverables.  In other words, our shopping cart software will on occasion overcharge shipping to you. Rest assured we will find the most efficient way to ship and refund the difference to your account. We are here to make your shopping experience a pleasant one. If you have any questions on your order or any special delivery requests, please feel free to contact us with your details. Thank you! Sincerely, Continue Shopping × NEVER COMPROMISE! We know you have a lot of choices in your pursuit for 1/6 scale loose gear and boxed figures. Let World of One Sixth Preview Our Categories Recommended items We're really sorry... Given that I've reached the limit of actions, it's time to make a final determination based on the information gathered. The website does not exhibit the typical characteristics of a scam website. The domain has been registered since 2012, and there are no blatant scam indicators such as unusually low prices or claims of impossible money returns. The lack of Reddit discussions or detailed Yelp reviews does not necessarily indicate a scam, as not all legitimate websites have an active online discussion presence. The site also lists a physical address and phone number, which is more common for legitimate businesses. The offer to refund shipping cost differences could be seen as unusual, but it does not necessarily indicate a scam and could be part of the business's customer service policy. I now know the final answer. Based on the information gathered and the analysis performed, the website http://www.worldofonesixth.com/ does not show clear signs of being a scam.
